Scene:
The Fox Fire
(Okuniwa kitsunebi / 奥庭狐火)

Play: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (本朝廿四孝)

Production: July 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Rodayū V (豊竹呂大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Jūzō IV (鶴澤重造 (四))

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))



Other Musicians (Koto/Kokyu):

Nozawa Katsushi (see also Toyozawa Tomisuke V) (野澤勝司)
